overview: "The Growing Pains Movie" is the first of two reunion movies based on the sitcom "Growing Pains".  When the Seaver family reunites in Washington, D.C., to celebrate Jason (Alan Thicke) and Maggie's (Joanna Kerns) 30th wedding anniversary, Maggie startles everyone when she announces her plans to run for a congress.
title: The Growing Pains Movie
